TestCase.name: testAggregateOnChangelogSource
TestCase.Resource: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM src WHERE a > 1
LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[COUNT()]) +- LogicalProject($f0=[0]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($1, 1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, src]])

GroupAggregate(select=[COUNT_RETRACT(*) AS EXPR$0], changelogMode=[I,UA,D]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single], changelogMode=[I,UB,UA]) +- Calc(select=[0 AS $f0], where=[>(a, 1)], changelogMode=[I,UB,UA]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, src, project=[a]]], fields=[a], changelogMode=[I,UB,UA])

TestCase.name: testDataStreamScan
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM DataStreamTable
LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, DataStreamTable]])
DataStreamScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, DataStreamTable]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testDDLTableScan
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM src WHERE a > 1

LogicalProject(ts=[$0], a=[$1], b=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($1, 1)]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[ts], watermark=[-($0, 1:INTERVAL SECOND)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, src]])

Calc(select=[ts, a, b], where=[>(a, 1)]) +- WatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[ts], watermark=[-(ts, 1:INTERVAL SECOND)]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, src]], fields=[ts, a, b])

TestCase.name: testDDLWithComputedColumn
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM t1
LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[+($0, 1)], d=[TO_TIMESTAMP($1)], e=[my_udf($0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1]])
Calc(select=[a, b, +(a, 1) AS c, TO_TIMESTAMP(b) AS d, my_udf(a) AS e]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1]], fields=[a, b])

TestCase.name: testDDLWithComputedColumnReferRowtime
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM src WHERE a > 1

LogicalProject(ts=[$0], a=[$1], b=[$2], my_ts=[$3], proc=[$4]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($1, 1)]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[ts], watermark=[-($0, 1:INTERVAL SECOND)]) +- LogicalProject(ts=[$0], a=[$1], b=[$2], my_ts=[-($0, 1:INTERVAL SECOND)], proc=[PROCTIME()]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, src]])

Calc(select=[ts, a, b, my_ts, PROCTIME_MATERIALIZE(proc) AS proc], where=[>(a, 1)]) +- WatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[ts], watermark=[-(ts, 1:INTERVAL SECOND)]) +- Calc(select=[ts, a, b, -(ts, 1:INTERVAL SECOND) AS my_ts, PROCTIME() AS proc]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, src]], fields=[ts, a, b])

TestCase.name: testDDLWithWatermarkComputedColumn
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM t1

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3], e=[$4]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[d], watermark=[-($3, 1:INTERVAL SECOND)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[+($0, 1)], d=[TO_TIMESTAMP($1)], e=[my_udf($0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1]])

WatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[d], watermark=[-(d, 1:INTERVAL SECOND)]) +- Calc(select=[a, b, +(a, 1) AS c, TO_TIMESTAMP(b) AS d, my_udf(a) AS e]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1]], fields=[a, b])

TestCase.name: testFilterOnChangelogSource
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM src WHERE a > 1
LogicalProject(ts=[$0], a=[$1], b=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($1, 1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, src]])
Calc(select=[ts, a, b], where=[>(a, 1)], changelogMode=[I,UB,UA,D]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, src]], fields=[ts, a, b], changelogMode=[I,UB,UA,D])

TestCase.name: testUnionChangelogSourceAndAggregation
TestCase.Resource: SELECT b, ts, a FROM ( SELECT * FROM changelog_src UNION ALL SELECT MAX(ts) as t, a, MAX(b) as b FROM append_src GROUP BY a )

LogicalProject(b=[$2], ts=[$0], a=[$1]) +- LogicalUnion(all=[true]) :- LogicalProject(ts=[$0], a=[$1], b=[$2]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, changelog_src]]) +- LogicalProject(t=[$1], a=[$0], b=[$2]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], t=[MAX($1)], b=[MAX($2)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$1], ts=[$0], b=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, append_src]])

Union(all=[true], union=[b, ts, a], changelogMode=[I,UB,UA,D]) :- Calc(select=[b, ts, a], changelogMode=[I,UB,UA,D]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, changelog_src]], fields=[ts, a, b], changelogMode=[I,UB,UA,D]) +- Calc(select=[b, t AS ts, a], changelogMode=[I,UB,UA]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[a], select=[a, MAX(ts) AS t, MAX(b) AS b], changelogMode=[I,UB,UA]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]], changelogMode=[I]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, append_src]], fields=[ts, a, b], changelogMode=[I])

TestCase.name: testJoinOnChangelogSource
TestCase.Resource: SELECT o.currency, o.amount, r.rate, o.amount * r.rate FROM orders AS o JOIN rates_history AS r ON o.currency = r.currency

LogicalProject(currency=[$1], amount=[$0], rate=[$3], EXPR$3=[*($0, $3)]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($1, $2)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, orders]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, rates_history]])

Calc(select=[currency, amount, rate, *(amount, rate) AS EXPR$3], changelogMode=[I,UA]) +- Join(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[=(currency, currency0)], select=[amount, currency, currency0, rate], leftInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey], rightInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey], changelogMode=[I,UA]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[currency]], changelogMode=[I]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, orders]], fields=[amount, currency], changelogMode=[I]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[currency]], changelogMode=[I,UB,UA]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, rates_history]], fields=[currency, rate], changelogMode=[I,UB,UA])

TestCase.name: testLegacyTableSourceScan
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable
LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])
LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testScanOnBoundedSource
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM src WHERE a > 1
LogicalProject(ts=[$0], a=[$1], b=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($1, 1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, src]])
Calc(select=[ts, a, b], where=[>(a, 1)], changelogMode=[I]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, src]], fields=[ts, a, b], changelogMode=[I])

TestCase.name: testScanOnChangelogSource
TestCase.Resource: SELECT b,a,ts FROM src
LogicalProject(b=[$2], a=[$1], ts=[$0]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, src]])
Calc(select=[b, a, ts], changelogMode=[I,UB,UA,D]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, src]], fields=[ts, a, b], changelogMode=[I,UB,UA,D])

TestCase.name: testKeywordsWithWatermarkComputedColumn
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM t1

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], time=[$2], mytime=[$3], current_time=[$4], json_row=[$5], timestamp=[$6]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[timestamp], watermark=[$6]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], time=[$2], mytime=[$2], current_time=[CURRENT_TIME], json_row=[$3], timestamp=[$3.timestamp]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1]])

WatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[timestamp], watermark=[timestamp]) +- Calc(select=[a, b, time, time AS mytime, CURRENT_TIME() AS current_time, json_row, json_row.timestamp AS timestamp]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1]], fields=[a, b, time, json_row])
